page.title: 03ASHOVER SHOW - EVENTS
page.content: The show is held on August 14th in 3 of the local fields near the village and lasts from 3.00 until 7.00.The show is really for the enjoyment of the village people.There is a big ring where all the cows and bulls and shire horses are judged and there are prizes for the best animals. There are stalls selling such things as fruit and hardware.They show farm equipment and machinary.At the end of the show horse and rider play games for ros- ettes and money.Sometimes they have dog races.There are advertisments from banks and local firms and their people give away plastic bags,balloons and stickers.Sometimes there is a main attration such as the {Red-arrows} display team who come and show their ability to fly.There are little round- abouts for small children.The entrance fee is usually about Â£1.
